category.name: Interface.Thin Client.Image
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: WEB_thumbnail_image_generate_type
preference.preference_description: All image types should be specified as MIME type/subtype. examples: (image/jpeg, image/tiff, image/gif, image/cgm, x-world/x-vrml, media/x-3dx, media/x-am3) thumbnail image type (in MIME format) to be generated. Only one type.
